tips.title: Approachable
tips.description: Borsch was designed from the ground up to be easily installed and used to get your app up and running quickly.

tips.title: Fast
tips.description: Dead simple, Borsch makes every effort possible to simplify configuration and processes resulting in an extra fast experience.
